alert.note: Alert for Calhoun Islands; Coastal Aransas; Coastal Calhoun; Coastal Refugio; Inland Calhoun; Inland Refugio (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 28 at 1:15AM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Aransas, southwestern Calhoun and east central Refugio Counties through 200 AM CDT... At 115 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Aransas National Wildlife Refuge, or 15 miles southwest of Seadrift, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Seadrift, Aransas National Wildlife Refuge, Long Mott and Austwell. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Calhoun Islands; Coastal Aransas; Coastal Calhoun; Coastal Refugio; Inland Calhoun; Inland Refugio
